Welcome to Ryboa Haima

Your Gateway to Industrial Excellence Sustainable Innovation

Since our founding in 1992, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality services to the Sultanate of Oman. With 30 years of expertise in Civil & Mechanical Construction, Oil & Gas, Maintenance, and various other sectors, we are committed to supporting Oman’s economic development. Thank you to all who have contributed to our success.

Discover More
Precision Performance

Achieving Excellence with Unmatched Precision and Performance

Innovative Automation

Leading the Way with Cutting-Edge Automation Solutions

Who We Are

Your Trusted and Visionary Partner in Engineering Excellence

Welcome to Ryboa Haima Group of Companies, your trusted partner in delivering comprehensive and innovative engineering solutions with unmatched precision and performance for over 33 years.

Professional Expert

Unparalleled Expertise from Industry Professionals

Variety of Services

Comprehensive Solutions Across All Disciplines

What WE Do

Our Major Services

Here is a short list of our services provided by Ryboa Haima

Rig Move Equipments & Services

Offer expert logistical support and specialized equipment for the efficient and secure relocation of drilling rigs.

Learn more
Civil Construction / Infrastructure Work

Essential services in building and maintaining infrastructure, including roads, bridges, and public facilities.

Learn more
Earthwork, Well Pad Location

Involves preparing land for drilling by moving and grading soil to create stable, level surfaces for well pads.

Learn more

Our Vision

Our vision is to become The Trusted Partner with everyone whom we have a relationship, be they clients, employees, shareholders, suppliers, members of the communities in which we are working or any other group or individual.

Learn more

Our Mission

To Provide the highest standard of services while providing pioneer, value -added Engineering Services to our customers with an ever-increasing spotlight on Oil and Gas production, Refining, Exploration and other major industries.

Learn more

Our Motto

Building Trust, Delivering Excellence through Unmatched Engineering Services and Lasting Partnerships

Learn more

Why Choose Us

World class quality is our priority

Our exceptional services, extensive experience, and commitment to excellence make us the ideal partner for all your project needs.

Comprehensive Service Range

We offer a full range of services, from Rig Move Equipment and Civil Construction to Electrical & Instrumentation and Waste Management, all under one roof.

Expertise and Experience

With 30 years of experience, our team delivers unmatched expertise and innovative solutions, ensuring top quality and efficiency in every project.

Commitment to Excellence

Our commitment to top-tier services like Mechanical Maintenance, Structural Fabrication, and Well Support Services ensures reliable, superior results for our clients.

Trusted Partnerships

We build lasting relationships with clients, suppliers, and the community, ensuring success through reliable, value-driven Engineering Services and support.

What WE oFFER
